title: Patterns
description: Featuring an introduction by Bruce Sterling, this collection of short fiction by Pat Cadigan won the Locus Award for best collection in 1990. The final story, "The Power and the Passion", was original to this collection. The previously published stories included here * Eenie, Meenie, Ipsateenie* Vengeance is Yours* The Day the Martels Got the Cable* Roadside Rescue* Rock On* Heal* Another One Hits the Road* My Brother's Keeper* Pretty Boy Crossover* Two* Angel* It Was the Heat* The Power and the Passion
author: Pat Cadigan
